purpose: The email announces the extension of the submission deadline for JOWO workshops to June 14th, 2025, encouraging participants to submit their work. It emphasizes the importance of sharing ideas and highlights the potential impact of even small contributions. Additionally, it provides details about various workshops and important dates related to the event.
evidence_sentences: The submission deadline of all JOWO workshops has been extended to June 14th, 2025.
Donâ€™t hesitate, even a small idea can have huge impact.
Take this chance, we welcome your work within the communities of Joint Ontologies Workshops (JOWO).
JOWO is co-hosted with the 15th International Conference on Formal Ontology in Information Systems (FOIS), held at Catania from September 8-12, 2025.
Workshop paper submission deadline: 25 May 2025 1 June 14 June 2025.
